ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: How do you feel?
ygData.msgSnippet: I personally was bummed when they made it impossible to solo monks any more.  I haven t been feeling the urge to log in much since they did that, so I was one
ygData.messageBody:
I personally was bummed when they made it impossible
to solo monks any more. I haven't been feeling the
urge to log in much since they did that, so I was one
of the ones who voted to let people solo, even with a
penality... I'd enjoy it more than begging for groups
in the planes.

I've been in the game since 4/1/99 so I think I can
say with certainty that its a million times easier
than it used to be. Many more zones, much less
crowding, tons of more items, features like the Bazaar
and being able to move around without a drood's help,
etc. Its a better game now.

But I'd give it all back to not have to beg for
groups. Sitting and spinning on my arse while I wait
for a group desperate enough to take a monk is a
bummer, and not fun in my view. Figuring out a
stratagy to solo certain spots was great fun for me,
as well as the competition with other solo's for the
good spots.

I didn't care so much about the monk nerf power wise
except that it came at a time when we were being
forced to group past 60... double whammy that makes it
hard to get in a group.

Quwi Changkane, Fenin Ro Grandmaster


--- hoggtyed <hoggtyed@...> wrote:
> I agree it is hard but c3 and c2 truly unbalance
> the game a young
> chanter had no chance to group. No one needed you
> it also took away
> from bards as mana batteries. I am glad they
> balanced it. The
> reason you are upset with your toon is its off the
> crack and feeling
> the shock of withdrawal. Suck it up and learn to
> play your toon.
> You will be glad you did later. Its easy to play
> any class if its
> twinked out or buffed to the hilt. Find a class you
> like buck naked
> and unbuffed thats where you will be happy in the
> long haul. For me
> it was the Monk and Beastlord. A good place to try
> all the classes is
> on the test server do the test buff and bam your 25
> with decent gear.
> PS. For those of you with an eye
> for grammer and
> spelling, what can I say but enjoy =O` /wink
>
>
> My 2 copper Hawg
>
>
